body.p:
State of Pennsylvania
City and County of Philadelphia } ss.

Be it Remembered that on the eleventh day of March A.D. 1861. Before me the undersigned an alderman and Ex officio Justice of the Peace of the said City of Philadelphia and authorized under the laws of the state of Pennsylvania to administer oaths, personally appeared Joshua Sperring who being duly sworn according to law did say, that he would well and truly execute and perform, all the duties of the office of Commissioner of Deeds for the state of Kentucky to which he has been appointed by Commission from the Governor thereof dated the 27th day of February 1861.

Sworn and subscribed before me -- Witness my Hand and seal
James McCahen
Alderman

Pennsylvania
Oath of J Sperring
Comr of Deeds
Filed Mar 14 1861
